title: Unable to create RESTEasy Reactive application with 10k endpoints
body:
### Describe the bug

after creating multiple controllers to test the compilation time using the following script

```ruby
#!/usr/bin/ruby

i = 1
10000.times do |val|
  puts i

  File.open("./GreetingResource#{i}.java", 'w+') do |f|
    f.write(
      <<~HEREDOC
        package org.acme;

        import javax.ws.rs.GET;
        import javax.ws.rs.Path;
        import javax.ws.rs.Produces;
        import javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType;

        @Path("/hello#{i}")
        public class GreetingResource#{i} {

            @GET
            @Produces(MediaType.TEXT_PLAIN)
            public String hello() {
                return "Hello from RESTEasy Reactive #{i}";
            }
        }
      HEREDOC
    )
  end

  i+=1
end
```

when I tried to up the application I received the following error:
```java
Listening for transport dt_socket at address: 5005
2023-03-16 16:35:07,036 INFO  [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (main) Attempting to start live reload endpoint to recover from previous Quarkus startup failure

	at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$3.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:909)
	at io.quarkus.builder.BuildContext.run(BuildContext.java:281)
	at org.jboss.threads.ContextHandler$1.runWith(ContextHandler.java:18)
	at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$Task.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:2449)

```

### Expected behavior

Up the server without errors

### Actual behavior

Appears the following error:
```

```

### How to Reproduce?

1. Create a new Quarkus project
2. Go to the path `/src/main/java/org/acme`
3. run the following script

```ruby
#!/usr/bin/ruby

i = 1
10000.times do |val|
  puts i

  File.open("./GreetingResource#{i}.java", 'w+') do |f|
    f.write(
      <<~HEREDOC
        package org.acme;

        import javax.ws.rs.GET;
        import javax.ws.rs.Path;
        import javax.ws.rs.Produces;
        import javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType;

        @Path("/hello#{i}")
        public class GreetingResource#{i} {

            @GET
            @Produces(MediaType.TEXT_PLAIN)
            public String hello() {
                return "Hello from RESTEasy Reactive #{i}";
            }
        }
      HEREDOC
    )
  end

  i+=1
end
```

4. run the command `quarkus dev` 

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin MacBook-Pro.local 22.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 22.3.0: Mon Jan 30 20:42:11 PST 2023; root:xnu-8792.81.3~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-11.0.18+10 (build 11.0.18+10, mixed mode)

### Quarkus version or git rev
